sentence: …General. CRA incorporates the Administrative       Procedure Act's (APA) definition of a rule for this purpose,       with three exceptions. We conclude that the Barred Owl ROD is       a rule for purposes of CRA because it meets the APA       definition of a rule, and no CRA exception applies.       Therefore, the ROD is subject to CRA's submission…

In March of this year, Alaska's congressional delegation requested  that  the Government Accountability Office, GAO, determine whether the 2022  NPR-A IAP ROD constituted a ``rule'' under the Congressional Review  Act, CRA. GAO issued its legal opinion in July, concluding that the  2022 NPR-A IAP ROD is a rule under the Administrative Procedures…

…the definition of ``rule''       under the Administrative Procedure Act (APA) but excludes       certain categories of rules from coverage. We conclude that       the 2022 ROD is a rule for purposes of CRA because it meets       the APA definition of a rule, and no CRA exception applies.
